original_text: He shall enter also into the glorious land, and many countries shall be overthrown: but these shall escape out of his hand, even Edom, and Moab, and the chief of the children of Ammon.
korean_text: 그가 또 영화로운 땅에 들어갈 것이요 많은 나라를 패망하게 할 것이나 오직 에돔과 모압과 암몬 자손의 지도자들은 그의 손에서 벗어나리라

sentences.original_text: He shall enter also into the glorious land
and many countries shall be overthrown
but these shall escape out of his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이들은 그의 손에서 벗어날 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the chief of the children of Ammon
